problem.markdown: 1. The timer 3, in default timer file 4, can be addressed as ________ ( ) T3/4 ( ) T3:4 (x) T4:3 ( ) T4/3 2. Timers are output instructions that are internal to the programmable logic controller. ( ) The above statement is false (x) The above statement is true 3. In timer element, word 2 is for ________ (x) Accumulated value ( ) Preset value ( ) Status bits 4. An on-delay timer is not retentive in nature. ( ) The above statement is false (x) The above statement is true 5. In word zero, of timer element, bit 15, is the _______ (x) Timer-enable bit ( ) Timer-timing bit ( ) Timer-done bit
problem.p: 1. The timer 3, in default timer file 4, can be addressed as ________
2. Timers are output instructions that are internal to the programmable logic controller.
3. In timer element, word 2 is for ________
4. An on-delay timer is not retentive in nature.
5. In word zero, of timer element, bit 15, is the _______
